__e: Just one little incident to bring back to the men, sir.
But one day, as I had an experience that everything has changed.

The colour of your skin, the freckles, the blood vessels, the rings, the fingernails, the fake fingernails... take in all those details right before you close your eyes. And then see those hands, your fingers wrapping around the steering wheel of your brand new car.
And I had, once, a very bad horse experience.
For what it's worth I'm really glad that you're here sharing this horrifying experience with me.
Major Talbott's grandsons are only in town for one more day, so it's great they get to share this experience with him.
